cards.name: Akroma's Devoted
cards.text: Cleric creatures have vigilance.
cards.flavor: Akroma asked for only one thing from her troops: unwavering, unconditional loyalty.

cards.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
cards.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
cards.flavor: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."

cards.name: Aphetto Exterminator
cards.text:
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Aphetto Exterminator is turned face up, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Aven Envoy
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Their grieving faces tell far more than a list of casualties ever could.

cards.name: Aven Redeemer
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
cards.flavor: Redeemers rise with the sun, and the spirits of the people rise with them.

cards.name: Aven Warhawk
cards.text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Bird and/or Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)
Flying

cards.name: Bane of the Living
cards.text:
Morph {X}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bane of the Living is turned face up, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

cards.name: Beacon of Destiny
cards.text: {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to Beacon of Destiny instead.
cards.flavor: "We all borrowed life from the Ancestor to exist in this world. Today, I repay that debt."

cards.name: Berserk Murlodont
cards.text: Whenever a Beast becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
cards.flavor:
"The harder we press forward, the harder Krosa pushes us back."
—Aven scout

cards.name: Blade Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+0.
cards.flavor: After breaking free from the Riptide Project, the slivers quickly adapted to life on Otaria—much to the dismay of life on Otaria.

cards.name: Blood Celebrant
cards.text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Their blood is the nectar that nourishes the Cabal."
—Phage the Untouchable

cards.name: Bloodstoke Howler
cards.text:
Morph {6}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bloodstoke Howler is turned face up, Beast creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Branchsnap Lorian
cards.text:
Trample
Morph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Lorians treat trees and prey the same way: by ripping them limb from limb.

cards.name: Brontotherium
cards.text:
Trample
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
cards.flavor: Lucky victims get run over. Unlucky victims get run through.

cards.name: Brood Sliver
cards.text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Within weeks, more slivers nested in Otaria than ever existed on Rath.

cards.name: Caller of the Claw
cards.text:
Flash
When Caller of the Claw enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield for each nontoken creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

cards.name: Canopy Crawler
cards.text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Canopy Crawler.

cards.name: Celestial Gatekeeper
cards.text:
Flying
When Celestial Gatekeeper dies, exile it, then return up to two target Bird and/or Cleric permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Cephalid Pathmage
cards.text:
Cephalid Pathmage can't be blocked.
{T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Pathmage: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor: Pathmages can open doors that aren't even there.

cards.name: Chromeshell Crab
cards.text:
Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Chromeshell Crab is turned face up, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls.

cards.name: Clickslither
cards.text:
Haste
Sacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The least popular goblins get the outer caves.

cards.name: Cloudreach Cavalry
cards.text: As long as you control a Bird, Cloudreach Cavalry gets +2/+2 and has flying.
cards.flavor: "It's easy to lose sight of hope until you gaze out from my vantage point."

cards.name: Corpse Harvester
cards.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a Swamp card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Covert Operative
cards.text: Covert Operative can't be blocked.
cards.flavor: Some spies seek clarity. Others seek transparency.

cards.name: Crested Craghorn
cards.text:
Haste
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
cards.flavor:
"Craghorns experience a wide range of emotions: rage, fury, anger . . ."
—Foothill guide

cards.name: Crookclaw Elder
cards.text:
Flying
Tap two untapped Birds you control: Draw a card.
Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Crypt Sliver
cards.text: All Slivers have "{T}: Regenerate target Sliver."
cards.flavor:
"Death couldn't contain the slivers. What made us think we could?"
—Riptide Project researcher

cards.name: Dark Supplicant
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice three Clerics: Search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for a card named Scion of Darkness and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
cards.flavor: Cabal clerics serve two masters: their patriarch and their god.

cards.name: Daru Mender
cards.text:
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Daru Mender is turned face up, regenerate target creature.

cards.name: Daru Sanctifier
cards.text:
Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Daru Sanctifier is turned face up, destroy target enchantment.

cards.name: Daru Stinger
cards.text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Human and/or Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)
{T}: Daru Stinger deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

cards.name: Deathmark Prelate
cards.text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Zombie: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
cards.flavor: Death is a secret he is willing to share.

cards.name: Defender of the Order
cards.text:
Morph {W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Defender of the Order is turned face up, creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Defiant Elf
cards.text: Trample
cards.flavor: "I lost one home when Yavimaya was destroyed. I will not lose another."

cards.name: Deftblade Elite
cards.text:
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
{1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Deftblade Elite this turn.

cards.name: Dermoplasm
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Dermoplasm is turned face up, you may put a creature card with morph from your hand onto the battlefield face up. If you do, return Dermoplasm to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Dreamborn Muse
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand.
cards.flavor:
"Her voice is insight, piercing and true."
—Ixidor, reality sculptor

cards.name: Drinker of Sorrow
cards.text:
Drinker of Sorrow can't block.
Whenever Drinker of Sorrow deals combat damage, sacrifice a permanent.
cards.flavor: It strikes at your soul, heedless of your prayers.

cards.name: Dripping Dead
cards.text:
Dripping Dead can't block.
Whenever Dripping Dead deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: It oozes death from every pore.

cards.name: Earthblighter
cards.text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target land.
cards.flavor: "A single dedicated mind can bring about the greatest destruction. That, or goblins—goblins work too."

cards.name: Echo Tracer
cards.text:
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Echo Tracer is turned face up, return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Elvish Soultiller
cards.text: When Elvish Soultiller dies, choose a creature type. Shuffle all creature cards of that type from your graveyard into your library.
cards.flavor: Mutated elves wondered if this was their final form, or if it was just another step.

cards.name: Embalmed Brawler
cards.text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
Whenever Embalmed Brawler attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life for each +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Enormous Baloth
cards.flavor: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.

cards.name: Essence Sliver
cards.text: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.
cards.flavor: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.

cards.name: Feral Throwback
cards.text:
Amplify 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

cards.name: Flamewave Invoker
cards.text: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
cards.flavor: The Mirari burns in his heart.

cards.name: Frenetic Raptor
cards.text: Beasts can't block.
cards.flavor:
"How do you stop a raptor from charging? No, seriously Help"
—Blarg, goblin jester

cards.name: Fugitive Wizard
cards.flavor: Many wizards came to the Riptide Project hoping to return home with answers. Most, however, wouldn't return home at all.

cards.name: Gempalm Avenger
cards.text:
Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Avenger, Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Gempalm Incinerator
cards.text:
Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

cards.name: Gempalm Polluter
cards.text:
Cycling {B}{B} ({B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Polluter, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield.

cards.name: Gempalm Sorcerer
cards.text:
Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Sorcerer, Wizard creatures gain flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Gempalm Strider
cards.text:
Cycling {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Strider, Elf creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Ghastly Remains
cards.text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ghastly Remains is in your graveyard, you may pay {B}{B}{B}. If you do, return Ghastly Remains to your hand.

cards.name: Glintwing Invoker
cards.text: {7}{U}: Glintwing Invoker gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Mirari flares in his mind.

cards.name: Glowering Rogon
cards.text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
cards.flavor: A herd of one.

cards.name: Glowrider
cards.text: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
cards.flavor: "It is not yet time."

cards.name: Goblin Assassin
cards.text: Whenever Goblin Assassin or another Goblin enters the battlefield, each player flips a coin. Each player whose coin comes up tails sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: The more victims he kills, the more likely he is to get the right one.

cards.name: Goblin Clearcutter
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Did you know that wood burns even better than rocks?"
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

cards.name: Goblin Dynamo
cards.text:
{T}: Goblin Dynamo deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
{X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Dynamo: Goblin Dynamo deals X damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Goblin Firebug
cards.text: When Goblin Firebug leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land.
cards.flavor: Most goblins leave behind a wake of destruction. A few goblins take one with them.

cards.name: Goblin Goon
cards.text:
Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.
Goblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.
cards.flavor: Giant-sized body. Goblin-sized brain.

cards.name: Goblin Grappler
cards.text: Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
cards.flavor: Daru soldiers learned it's better to have a clean death from a sharp blade than to tangle with a goblin's rusted chains.

cards.name: Goblin Lookout
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Goblin creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Throw rocks at 'em Throw spears at 'em Throw Furt at 'em"

cards.name: Goblin Turncoat
cards.text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Regenerate Goblin Turncoat.
cards.flavor:
"Goblins won't betray their own kind for any price. They'll do it for a very specific price."
—Phage the Untouchable

cards.name: Graveborn Muse
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
cards.flavor:
"Her voice is damnation, unyielding and certain."
—Phage the Untouchable

cards.name: Havoc Demon
cards.text:
Flying
When Havoc Demon dies, all creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A cry of pain as it enters this world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.

cards.name: Hollow Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Hollow Specter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {X}. If you do, that player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Hundroog
cards.text: Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor:
"New links are being added to the food chain on a daily basis."
—Riptide Project researcher

cards.name: Hunter Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures have provoke. (When a Sliver attacks, its controller may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
cards.flavor: Once they get the scent, there is no escape.

cards.name: Imperial Hellkite
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {6}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Imperial Hellkite is turned face up, you may search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Infernal Caretaker
cards.text:
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Infernal Caretaker is turned face up, return all Zombie cards from all graveyards to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Keeneye Aven
cards.text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: "I have no need of a map. The very continent itself guides my way."

cards.name: Keeper of the Nine Gales
cards.text:
Flying
{T}, Tap two untapped Birds you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "You cannot fight the storm."

cards.name: Kilnmouth Dragon
cards.text:
Amplify 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it for each Dragon card you reveal in your hand.)
Flying
{T}: Kilnmouth Dragon deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target creature or player.

cards.name: Krosan Cloudscraper
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Krosan Cloudscraper unless you pay {G}{G}.
Morph {7}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Krosan Vorine
cards.text:
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
Krosan Vorine can't be blocked by more than one creature.

cards.name: Lavaborn Muse
cards.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Lavaborn Muse deals 3 damage to him or her.
cards.flavor:
"Her voice is disaster, painful and final."
—Matoc, lavamancer

cards.name: Liege of the Axe
cards.text:
Vigilance
Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Liege of the Axe is turned face up, untap it.

cards.name: Lowland Tracker
cards.text:
First strike
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
cards.flavor:
"I feed my hatred to the righteous and they join my crusade."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

cards.name: Macetail Hystrodon
cards.text:
First strike, haste
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: The goblins tracked the hystrodon with much stealth and cunning. Then they were eaten with much pain and yelling.

cards.name: Magma Sliver
cards.text: All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers on the battlefield."
cards.flavor: As malleable as molten steel, but as dangerous as the finished blade.

cards.name: Master of the Veil
cards.text:
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Master of the Veil is turned face up, you may turn target creature with morph face down.

cards.name: Merchant of Secrets
cards.text: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.

cards.name: Mistform Seaswift
cards.text:
Flying
{1}: Mistform Seaswift becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Mistform Sliver
cards.text: All Slivers have "{1}: This permanent becomes the creature type of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn."
cards.flavor: Taking the form of a junior researcher, the first sliver slipped out of Riptide.

cards.name: Mistform Ultimus
cards.text: Mistform Ultimus is every creature type (even if this card isn't on the battlefield).
cards.flavor: It may wear your face, but its mind is its own.

cards.name: Mistform Wakecaster
cards.text:
Flying
{1}: Mistform Wakecaster becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Choose a creature type. Each creature you control becomes that type until end of turn.

cards.name: Nantuko Vigilante
cards.text:
Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Nantuko Vigilante is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.name: Needleshot Gourna
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: The first aven scout squad returned from Krosa with disturbing stories. The second returned with disturbing casualties.

cards.name: Noxious Ghoul
cards.text: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie enters the battlefield, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Plague and death wrapped in one convenient package.

cards.name: Patron of the Wild
cards.text:
Morph {2}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Patron of the Wild is turned face up, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Phage the Untouchable
cards.text:
When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

cards.name: Planar Guide
cards.text: {3}{W}, Exile Planar Guide: Exile all creatures. At the beginning of the next end step, return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.
cards.flavor: "Every moment has its own savior."

cards.name: Plated Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures get +0/+1.
cards.flavor: Overcoming extinction has only made the slivers more determined to live.

cards.name: Primal Whisperer
cards.text:
Primal Whisperer gets +2/+2 for each face-down creature on the battlefield.
Morph {3}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Primoc Escapee
cards.text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Though a completely artificial species, primocs are a natural fit for the skies of Otaria.

cards.name: Quick Sliver
cards.text:
Flash
Any player may play Sliver cards as though they had flash.
cards.flavor: The directors of the Riptide Project wanted instant results on the sliver experiments. They got their wish.

cards.name: Ridgetop Raptor
cards.text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor:
"The Skirk Ridge has many wonderful things to discover—like escape routes."
—Foothill guide

cards.name: Riptide Director
cards.text: {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Draw a card for each Wizard you control.
cards.flavor: Those who lead others to wisdom become the wisest themselves.

cards.name: Riptide Mangler
cards.text: {1}{U}: Change Riptide Mangler's base power to target creature's power. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
cards.flavor: It wants you to be its chum.

cards.name: Rockshard Elemental
cards.text:
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Morph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Root Sliver
cards.text:
Root Sliver can't be countered.
Sliver spells can't be countered by spells or abilities.
cards.flavor:
"It would take another apocalypse to stop the slivers now."
—Riptide Project researcher

cards.name: Scion of Darkness
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Scion of Darkness deals combat damage to a player, you may put target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Seedborn Muse
cards.text: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.
cards.flavor:
"Her voice is wilderness, savage and pure."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

cards.name: Shaleskin Plower
cards.text:
Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Shaleskin Plower is turned face up, destroy target land.

cards.name: Shifting Sliver
cards.text: Slivers can't be blocked except by Slivers.
cards.flavor: Once the last few slivers the Riptide Project controlled were dead, there was nothing to keep the island from being completely overrun.

cards.name: Skinthinner
cards.text:
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Skinthinner is turned face up, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Skirk Alarmist
cards.text:
Haste
{T}: Turn target face-down creature you control face up. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.
cards.flavor: "I treat each day as your last."

cards.name: Skirk Drill Sergeant
cards.text: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin dies, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: "I order you to volunteer."

cards.name: Skirk Marauder
cards.text:
Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Skirk Marauder is turned face up, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Skirk Outrider
cards.text: As long as you control a Beast, Skirk Outrider gets +2/+2 and has trample.
cards.flavor: Once the goblins thought about it, they preferred being atop a slateback to being in front of, behind, or underneath one.

cards.name: Smokespew Invoker
cards.text: {7}{B}: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Mirari festers in its flesh.

cards.name: Sootfeather Flock
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: They pick at the remains of the city's corpse.

cards.name: Spectral Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
cards.flavor:
"Sure, I've seen agents of the Cabal here and there. Well, not here, and certainly not in any of the sliver labs. Oh dear, I've said too much."
—Apprentice researcher

cards.name: Starlight Invoker
cards.text: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.
cards.flavor: The Mirari glows in her eyes.

cards.name: Stoic Champion
cards.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Stoic Champion gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: His outer calm belies his inner fury.

cards.name: Stonewood Invoker
cards.text: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

cards.name: Sunstrike Legionnaire
cards.text:
Sunstrike Legionnaire doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Sunstrike Legionnaire.
{T}: Tap target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

cards.name: Swooping Talon
cards.text:
Flying
{1}: Swooping Talon loses flying until end of turn.
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

cards.name: Synapse Sliver
cards.text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Species XR17 feeds upon the mental energies of its victims. This explains why the goblins remain unaffected."
—Riptide Project researcher

cards.name: Timberwatch Elf
cards.text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

cards.name: Totem Speaker
cards.text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: "Elves and beasts are tied together, and I am the knot that binds them."

cards.name: Toxin Sliver
cards.text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: It doesn't need to use its venom—it just needs you to know it can.

cards.name: Tribal Forcemage
cards.text:
Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Tribal Forcemage is turned face up, creatures of the creature type of your choice get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Unstable Hulk
cards.text:
Morph {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Unstable Hulk is turned face up, it gets +6/+6 and gains trample until end of turn. You skip your next turn.

cards.name: Vexing Beetle
cards.text:
Vexing Beetle can't be countered.
Vexing Beetle gets +3/+3 as long as no opponent controls a creature.
cards.flavor: As the Mirari's mutating effects grew out of control, centaurs and druids fled—but insects swarmed closer.

cards.name: Vile Deacon
cards.text: Whenever Vile Deacon attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "The Cabal and the Order really aren't that different. After all, we are both empowered by faith."

cards.name: Voidmage Apprentice
cards.text:
Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Voidmage Apprentice is turned face up, counter target spell.

cards.name: Wall of Deceit
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Turn Wall of Deceit face down.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Wall of Hope
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Hope is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
cards.flavor:
"What cage would you rather be inside of than out?"
—Daru riddle

cards.name: Warbreak Trumpeter
cards.text:
Morph {X}{X}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Warbreak Trumpeter is turned face up, put X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Ward Sliver
cards.text:
As Ward Sliver enters the battlefield, choose a color.
All Slivers have protection from the chosen color.
cards.flavor: The first wave of slivers perished from the Riptide wizards' magic. The second wave shrugged off their spells like water.

cards.name: Warped Researcher
cards.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Warped Researcher gains flying and shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor: New insights yield new senses.

cards.name: Weaver of Lies
cards.text:
Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Weaver of Lies is turned face up, turn any number of target creatures with morph other than Weaver of Lies face down.

cards.name: Whipgrass Entangler
cards.text: {1}{W}: Until end of turn, target creature gains "This creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each Cleric on the battlefield."
cards.flavor: "Now that I have your attention, perhaps I can tell you of the Order."

cards.name: White Knight
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
cards.flavor: In the wretched depths of the Grand Coliseum, his soul shines like a single torch blazing in the night.

cards.name: Willbender
cards.text:
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

cards.name: Windborn Muse
cards.text:
Flying
Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.
cards.flavor:
"Her voice is justice, clear and relentless."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

cards.name: Wingbeat Warrior
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Wingbeat Warrior is turned face up, target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Wirewood Channeler
cards.text: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Your words are meaningless. The rustling of leaves is the only language that makes any sense."

cards.name: Wirewood Hivemaster
cards.text: Whenever another nontoken Elf enters the battlefield, you may put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Most insects have been drawn to the Mirari. But all that remain in Wirewood are under my care."

cards.name: Withered Wretch
cards.text: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
cards.flavor: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

cards.name: Zombie Brute
cards.text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
Trample
cards.flavor: Measure its determination by the screams of its prey.
